events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but it doesn't fit at all. I would like to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been reviewed and categorized under the Refund cluster due to the customer's request for returning the product and getting their money back.
The support case has been assigned to agent Sarah Thompson, who will assist with the refund process for the returned jacket.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I'm here to assist you with your refund request for the jacket that doesn't fit.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been used or damaged in any way?
The order number is A123456789. The jacket is brand new and hasn't been worn or damaged. I just need the refund because it’s too small.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately after you ship the jacket back to us using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly.
That sounds perfect, thanks! I’ll print the label and send the jacket back today.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect on your payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and to see if there is anything else we can assist you with.
We are closing this case now. Feel free to contact us again in the future if you need any further assistance.
